Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore hope to lure Chinese with visa-free travelChinese engineer and aviation enthusiast Wei Ming is exactly the kind of visitor the tourism authorities in Singapore, Malaysia and Thailand are looking for. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 01:10:43 GMT UFMPX2ZVH5JQ3EOJ6RMEPAUMVU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thailand-malaysia-singapore-hope-lure-chinese-with-visa-free-travel-2024-02-09/Xinghui Kok, Lisa Barrington, Orathai Sriring世界亚太地区
Putin says a swap deal to free WSJ reporter Gershkovich might be possibleRussian President Vladimir Putin said in an interview aired on Thursday that it might be possible to free Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich, who is awaiting trial on spying charges, in exchange for a Russian prisoner. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 00:44:45 GMT AFWEASP27ZKBNPHJ4E3A7MWG4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-says-swap-deal-free-wsj-reporter-gershkovich-might-be-possible-2024-02-09/David Ljunggren世界欧洲
El Salvador ex-security adviser who accused ruling party of corruption dies in custodyA former national security adviser to El Salvador's government, who had accused a congressman from the ruling New Ideas party of corruption and drug trafficking, died in state custody in unclear circumstances, his family told reporters on Thursday. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 00:31:16 GMT 7AXNRSVWRVOYPDDMOSEMQV4Y6E https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/el-salvador-ex-security-adviser-who-accused-ruling-party-corruption-dies-custody-2024-02-09/Reuters世界美洲
Pakistan vote results trickle in after election marred by attacks, outagesPakistan's vote count following a general election was hit by unusual delays on Friday, with results from only a handful of national parliament seats announced over 12 hours after polls closed after the government suspended mobile phone services. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 00:24:20 GMT DYS4ZQKB4JLGVCDBQ7MV33YDBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-vote-counts-drags-after-election-marred-by-attacks-outages-2024-02-09/Asif Shahzad, Ariba Shahid世界亚太地区
Putin tells Tucker Carlson Russia has no interest in attacking Poland or LatviaRussian President Vladimir Putin said in an interview that aired on Thursday that Russia will fight for its interests but has no interest in expanding its war in Ukraine to other countries such as Poland and Latvia. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 00:01:06 GMT TUJL6SJYIJK73DSR6K4NTKNCVU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-rare-us-interview-says-Russia-has-no-interest-attacking-poland-or-latvia-2024-02-09/David Ljunggren, Ronald Popeski, David Brunnstrom世界欧洲
Russia's Putin: we have no interest in invading Poland or LatviaRussian President Vladimir Putin said in an interview aired on Thursday that Moscow had no interest in invading "Poland, Latvia or anywhere else" and said talk that Moscow might do so was threat mongering, Thu, 08 Feb 2024 23:38:17 GMT WPRDQZP6PFIW7JL52QU257YQPM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russias-putin-we-have-no-interest-invading-poland-or-latvia-2024-02-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Guatemala to maintain Taiwan ties despite seeking greater China tradeGuatemala has no intention of breaking diplomatic relations with Taiwan despite seeking closer economic links with China, President Bernardo Arevalo said on Thursday, pledging to boost ties with both players in parallel. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 23:24:45 GMT 3OKNBH5T6NIWRPHZZAGBKTBC7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/guatemala-maintain-taiwan-ties-尽管-seeking-greater-china-trade-2024-02-08/Sofia Menchu世界
UN chief concerned by violence, communication restriction on Pakistan election dayUnited Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres on Thursday expressed concern about violence in Pakistan and the suspension of mobile communications services on election day in the South Asian nation, his spokesperson said in an emailed statement. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 22:39:34 GMT LGPHOWWIQRMFBDUJSW2GUXF2JM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/un-chief-concerned-by-violence-communication-restriction-pakistan-election-day-2024-02-08/Michelle Nichols, Kanishka Singh世界亚太地区
As Israel attacks Rafah, US offers only words of cautionU.S. officials made their most pointed criticism so far of Israel's civilian casualties in Gaza as it turns the focus of its offensive to Rafah, but there was nothing to suggest the rhetoric from Washington would be backed by action. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 22:34:15 GMT QKWUEVOXSZOIBN3UPRNBLELGJM https://www.reuters.com/world/israel-attacks-rafah-us-offers-only-words-caution-2024-02-08/Humeyra Pamuk世界
North Korea leader Kim: we will wipe out enemies if they use force -KCNANorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un said the country would not hesitate to use all of its military power to wipe out enemies if any of them used force against it as he marked the anniversary of the founding of its military, state media reported on Friday. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 22:20:54 GMT FUPRRDNLUZIWJMTHGK6UKPYJIY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-leader-kim-we-will-wipe-out-enemies-if-they-use-force-kcna-2024-02-08/Jack Kim世界亚太地区
Slovakia approves criminal law reforms that sparked protestsThe Slovak parliament approved reforms scrapping a special prosecution branch dealing with high-level crime and lowering punishments for financial crimes in a fast-track procedure on Thursday, amid public protests and concerns from the European Commission. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 21:12:50 GMT NKNOUDMOPVMP3JBBMI5XI4YL6M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/slovakia-approves-criminal-law-reforms-that-sparked-protests-2024-02-08/Jan Lopatka世界欧洲
